hero.headline: Group investing without the group drama.
hero.subhead: Take the conflict out of group investing. Our platform ensures every contribution, payout, and decision is clear and auditable.

problem.title: The Problem
points: Investing together sounds great ‚Äî until conflicts, confusion, and paperwork get in the way.

solution.title: Our Solution
points: We take the drama out of group investing. From setup to tracking to voting, our platform keeps everything clear, fair, and simple.

howItWorks.heading: How it works
howItWorks.subheading: Our streamlined process gets you from setup to success with minimal effort

steps.title: Pool Money
steps.description: Contributions and balances tracked in real time.

steps.title: Invest Together
steps.description: Vote, decide, and grow ‚Äî no fights, no fuss.

features.heading: Powerful Features For Successful Group Investing
features.description: Everything you need to manage your investment group efficiently

items.title: Member Management
items.description: Add, remove, and manage member permissions with ease.

items.title: Contribution Tracking
items.description: Monitor who has contributed what and when.

items.title: Voting System
items.description: Built-in tools for democratic investment decisions.

items.title: Document Storage
items.description: Keep all important documents in one secure place.

items.title: Bank Integration
items.description: Connect directly with your group's bank account.

items.title: Performance Reporting
items.description: Track your group's investments performance over time.

featured.quote: Vault saved us from endless group chats and spreadsheets. No more arguments ‚Äî just clear, simple investing together.
featured.name: David Anderson
featured.title: CTO, Global Innovations

testimonials.quote: Vault transformed how our team works together. We've seen a 40% increase in productivity and our clients are happier than ever.
testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: CEO, TechVision Inc.

testimonials.quote: The automation features alone saved us hundreds of hours per month. The ROI was immediate and the support team is incredible.
testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.title: Operations Director, Flux Enterprises

testimonials.quote: We were skeptical at first, but within weeks our team was completely on board. The analytics dashboards provide insights we never had access to before.
testimonials.name: Emma Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Marketing Manager, Brand Solutions

pricing.heading: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subheading: Choose the plan that fits your group's size and needs
pricing.footnote: All plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

plans.name: Starter
plans.description: Perfect for small investment groups just getting started.

plans.name: Growth
plans.description: For established groups looking to scale efficiently.

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: For large or multiple investment groups with advanced needs.

closing.heading: Turn your group into a team ‚Äî minus the drama.

hero.heading: Keep the fun in friends and the fights out of funds.
hero.subheading: Vault makes it easy to invest together without risking relationships. Pool your money, invest transparently, and keep the good vibes intact.

problem.title: The Problem
points: Mixing money and friends often ends in conflict, confusion, or awkward conversations.

solution.title: Our Solution
points: Our platform keeps friendships intact. With built-in transparency, fair voting, and clear exits, you can invest together without risking relationships.
